casebody.data:
BEAU RIVAGE HOMEOWNERS ASS'N v. NEW HANOVER COUNTY. No. COA04-671. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed March 15, 2005. Certification Date April 4, 2005. Appeal from the New Hanover (02CVS4389, 02CVS4628, 02CVS1422, 02CVS1423).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed.
